name: GoldSlash
description:
GoldSlash was created by: @_gjallar, @Maytch, @george81210929, and @JoshuaKnobb.

Avoid the Gobbs as you desperately attempt to refuel your coin-operated time machine!

Arrow keys recommended.

Gamepad will override.

'Z' and 'X' do slash and hack.

(Backspace if you get stuck!)
